title: The Low Road (w/ Mike Finoia)
description: Jay gets an irate message from a fan who is upset with him for cancelling his shows at Mohegan Sun this weekend. Jay does not take the high road in his response. Jay, Dan and Mike Finoia discuss the disturbing life of Jeffrey Epstein.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
